unnormalised: Barabor, konnem tori Bharotantlea sadaronn gastroenterology sombondit proxnancher vicharlem. Tech thoddem vostrut vicharopachem asa, punn hanv polloun ani vachun jem zannam tench hanv tuka sangonk xoktam. Hanv doctor nhoi, mhunnchem hantunt daktori sallai na, fokot zanna zaitelem mhunn sangtam.
normalised: Borem, konnem tori Bharotantlea sadaronn gastroenterology vixim prashn vicharlem. To ekdam vhodd prashn, punn hanv tuka hanven dekhil'leam ani vachillea pormonnem sadaronn suchna diunk xakta. Hanv doctor nhoi, dekhun hem voizki updes nhoi, fakt tuji mahiti khatir.

unnormalised: Ekdam sadaronn ghoddta tem mhunnllear acidity. Tumi Eno ani Digenechea addi sogleach vellar pollounk mellttat, kiteak nhi? Hem amchea tikhea jevnnak ani nem-naslelea jevnachea sobhaveak karonn zavonk xokta. Hanv zannam axim annek lok acidicher antacid vapurtat ji porim tori candy. Mhozo mama, Mr. Sharma, ek ut'tom udahoron; tannim eke antacidachi bottel toxench hadant dhorloli asta. To mhunnta ki 8 PM vellar samosache vixim vichar kelear-ui acidity vaddtta.
normalised: Ekdam sadaronn vostu mhunnttlear acidity asa. Tumi Eno ani Digene khatir ads sodanch pollounk xaktat, hoinam? Techim karan amchea tikhem jeunn ani niyomit nhoi tea jeunneachim poidam. Kitlo lok maka vollkhota tea lokamni antacids candy bhaxen gheta. Mhozo kak, Mister Sharma, ek mukhel udahoron; taka sodanch ekh adi acidity-cho bottlo lagta. To mhunta ki taka aatth post meridiem uprant samosa khavopachem *chintunk* laglem tori acidity vaddtta.

unnormalised: Dusrem mhunnllear, infections. Itle street food vikpe aslolean (hanv tancho mog kortam!), kitei mellcheachem bheim asta. Typhoid, hepatitis A, ani ekdom vaitt food poisoningache vixim vichar kor. Toxem kiteak tumi jevchea zageak samballunk zai. Mhoji ixttinn Priya Rishikeshyen vochun ailea uprant giardiasisak sampoddli. Tikka samki tin satlle lagle punn tichi tabiyat suddharunk, ani tinnem 5 kgs vozon ghalaylem. Kitlench vaitt!
normalised: Uprant, infections. Kitli street food vikrekaram (hanv tankam mog korta!), thoddem tori mellchea khatir bhirant asa. Think typhoid, hepatitis A, vo fakt fattlem khann jeunn poison zaunchea khasgi vostunchem kess. Tech khatir tumi khanchi jevtat tem samballchem poddta. Mhoji ixtt Priya Rishikesh-ak vochun giardiasis-ak poddli. Tika purnnponni bari zaunk te bhaxen tin satte lagle, ani tinnem panch kilograms ghatley. Bhayanak vostu!

unnormalised: Uprant Irritable Bowel Syndrome (IBS) asa. Hem vichitr mhunnllear sanglleamank vegllech lakxonnank lagun. Konnak tori kobjota zata, konnak tori dhost zata, ani konnak tori he donui zata. Vichaar kortat ki stressan vhodd panth kelo mhunn, ani hem sot kiteak nhi ki Bharotant jivit zaitem stressachem asta, nhim? Tacher khorench upay na, punn diet ani jeevonache sobhav bodlon lakxonnank samballunk zata. Bangaloreant IT kamachea stressak lagun annek lok dukhh bhogtat mhunn aikolam.
normalised: Uprant Irritable Bowel Syndrome (I-B-S) asa. Tem ek gombhir, karonn hem lakshann soglleank veg-vegllem astolem. Kaim lokamank kudd bandh zata, heramnk diarrhea zata, ani kaim zannamnk donui zata. Hem stress ek vhodd bhumika gheta mhonn chintun ghetlam, ani ami face korum, Bharotant jivit bhov stressfull astolem, hoinam? Tache khatir khoinchech dukh nivarochem vostu na, fakt jeunn ani jeevit bodol korn lakshann nivarchem. Bangalore-chea kitlo lok I-T kamachem stress karn hi dukh bhogta mhonn aikollam.

unnormalised: Lactose intolerance-ui samkem sadaronn. Bharotiank dudh ani dairy vostu jeerounk tras zata. Mhaka dista ki sumar 60-70% lokan kitlem tori lactose intolerance asta, axim kaim articles hanvem vachleant. Mhunnchem tum dudh pielea uprant bhorellam vo gassy zata tor, hem karonn zavonk xokta. Punn atam lactose-free dudh melltta, tea karonnank tem upkarta.
normalised: Lactose intolerance punn super sadaronn. Bharotantlea kitlo lokamank dudh ani dairy products pachonk tras zata. Hanv chintam team vortaman pathram pormonnem populationachem sadaranponni saat ani so-torichem percent lactose intolerance asa. Tum dudh piyen uprant pot dukhta vo potant hava zata mhonn tuka dista zalear, tem zaunk xakta. Punn tumak lactose-free dudh mellta, tenna tenka madad mellta.

unnormalised: Dusri vhodd bhag mhunnllear liver sambandit problemas. Fatty liver disease ani hepatitis B & C toxem vostu zaitech asat. Fatty liver-ak choddxe vakho astat dhonponnan lagun ani diabetesan, punn durbhagyean tem vaddta. Hepatitis B ani C komzarache zavonk xoktat ani liverak lossonn zanvk pavunk xoktat. Mhojea mama-putak Hep Cacho nidan kelolo, ani PGI Chandigarh-an tika ek vorsache vatten osuddh ghevn tabiyat suddharli. Nidan sodanch poilem korchem.
normalised: Her mukhel vibhag mhunnttlear liver sambhallchea problem. Thodea voram pormonnem fatty liver disease ani hepatitis B ani C vhodd pramanant asa. Fatty liver sodanch obesity ani diabetes lagun zata, tumkhem दुर्भाग्यपूर्णपण वाढीस लागतात. Hepatitis B ani C gombhir zaunk xakta ani te dogamni liver-chem नुकसान जाता. Mhozo cousin-ak Hep C zala mhonn dhokai asa ani taka varis भर औषध प्यी-जी-आई चंडीगढक बरे जावचाक लागले. लवकर तपासणी महत्वाचे.

unnormalised: Nimannem, piles (haemorrhoids) visronaka. Vixoi ulo vhodd nhoi, punn samkem sadaronn, khaskeren amchea jevnacher ani voiskant jivitachea sobhavant. Choddxe vellar potty saf kortana zor dilolo asta mhunn. Mhojea ajjek astalem, ani mhaka udi asa to sodanch kitlem tori cream vapurtalem. Kitlench lok hachem bhogtat, khaskeren jednam tanka vhoddponn yeta tednam. Tancher creamam, osuddham, vo surgery korun upay korunk zata. Rs 100 rupeanchem ek ut'tom jevon tumcher fuddarak zaite rupeanchem samballunk zata.
normalised: Shevottak, piles (haemorrhoids) visrunakai. Ulovpak lazonchichem, punn bhov sadaronn, khas korun amchea jeunn ani kam korunk naslelea jivitan lagun zata. Sodanch kudd halounam te bhaxen. Mhoje ajjek tim aslem, ani maka याद आसा तो sodanch क्रीम वाट्टो घेवन उपेग करणा. तो एक भूरगट लोक सांभाळटालो, खास करुन जशे ते जाले जावन वाटले. क्रीम, औषधां वा गंभिर प्रकरणांक शस्त्रक्रियेन उपचार करूंक शकतात. तुमच्या जेवणा खातीर खर्च केलेलो एकसो रूपया तुम्हाला भविष्यकाळात भरपूर बचत करूंक शकता.

unnormalised: Konnak tori, he kaim Bharotantlea sadaronn gastroenterology problemache vixim mhunn asat. Tuka kitei pottyache vixim tras assa tor, ek doctorak bhet ani nidan ani upayak vichoar. Fokot internetar melltolem dekhun vaizuki upay korunk vochonaka!
normalised: Khai, te Bharotantlea sadaronn gastroenterology issues asa. Tuka khoinchech पाचन समस्या आसले जाल्यार, योग्य निदान आनी उपचार खातीर डॉक्टरक मेळ. इंटरनेटचेर वाचून स्वतःक औषध घेऊं नका!
